column3: From reading the man page, it sounds like you want _LARGEFILE64_SOURCE too?\n
@jgarzik _FILE_OFFSET_BITS changes the size of off_t, and makes fopen transparently support large files. _LARGEFILE64_SOURCE adds off64_t, fseeko64()... in addition to the normal ones.\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/58ac2a35835935cd0d4336d85c08158f29e0ccde for binaries and test log.\n
I'm not sure, shouldn't this get added in the bitcoin-qt.pro file also?\n
